timer_endTime.title: activity end time
timer_endTime.help: hint：input activity end time，format as hh:mm:ss

facility_facilityId.title: facility ID
facility_facilityId.help: Hint:this can be used as activity block, but not recommended if you don't upload facility file

facility_actType.title: trip purpose
facility_actType.help: Hint:trip purpose, will dominate tripPurpose block

facility_facilityCoord.title: facility location
facility_facilityCoord.help: Hint:location as longitude,latitude if no facility.xml file

facility_facilityOpenTime.title: open time
facility_facilityOpenTime.help: Hint: need to modify, format as hh:mm:ss

facility_facilityCloseTime.title: close time
facility_facilityCloseTime.help: Hint: need to modify, format as hh:mm:ss

openStreet_minLong.title: min longitude
openStreet_minLong.help: Hint:please go to OPEN STREET MAP to choose the range

network_networkDefaultEPSG.title: networkDefaultEPSG
network_networkDefaultEPSG.help: Hint:please turn to EPSG , not working at the moment, only support WGS 84

network_linkDir.title: direction
network_linkDir.help: Hint: input directions of the link, use GIS software to formatted as: 0-double way(default if null or empty)，<0 from end node to start node，>0 from start to end

network_linkLane.title: lanes
network_linkLane.help: Hint: lane number for single direction, as int

network_linkMode.title: modes
network_linkMode.help: Hint: modes allowed on the link, splitted by ','

network_networkShpFile.title: upload .shp file
network_networkShpFile.help: Hint: a complete shp file includes .shp,.shx,.prj, .dbf and etc, must be the same prefix name

region_regionDefaultEPSG.title: default proj
region_regionDefaultEPSG.help: Hint:OPEN STREET MAP not working

region_regionId.title: regionID field
region_regionId.help: Hint:id field from the shp file, case sensitive

region_regionShpFile.title: upload .shp file
region_regionShpFile.help: Hint: traffic zone shp file, with polygon or multipolygon

odMatrix_odFileType.title: od file type
odMatrix_odFileType.help: Hint:first row is the destination id, first column is the origin id, the very first col|row can be anything, normally not-null
odMatrix_odFileType.error: Error: please read the help lines and check.

odMatrix_odAsRegionOrCoord.title: OD location type
odMatrix_odAsRegionOrCoord.help: Hint:if square matrix is chosen, only traffic zone id is allowed！
odMatrix_odAsRegionOrCoord.error: Error: please read the help lines and check.

odMatrix_odFile.title: activity(plan,od)file
odMatrix_odFile.help: Hint:only support csv or txt file at the moment, if od array is uploaded, please check the format as: id(0)|count(1)|oriDepatrueTime(2)|origionRegion(3)|originCoordX(4)|originCoordY(5)|departureTime1(6+8*i)|desiredMode1(7+8*i)|tripPurpose1(8+8*i)|desFacilityId1(9+8*i)|facilityChangable1(10+8*i)|desRegionId1(11+8*i)|desCoordX1(12+8*i)|desCoordY1(13+8*i) where i>=1
odMatrix_odFile.error: Error: please read the help lines and check.

mode_otherMode.title: user defined
mode_otherMode.help: Hint:input specific mode, have to be existed in the network file
mode_otherMode.error: Error: please read the help lines and check.
